newsitem.title: USA: Waxman USA Inc announces amounts tendered.
newsitem.headline: Waxman USA Inc announces amounts tendered.

text.p: Waxman USA Inc, a wholly owned subsidiary of Waxman Industries Inc said as March 31, 1997, approximately $429,000 or 8.9 percent of the outstanding principal amount of the company's Series A 11 1/8% Senior Notes due 2001 have been tendered pursuant to the exchange offer.

The offer to exchange $4,830,000 aggregate principal amount of the company's Series B 11 1/8 percent senior notes due 2001 for $4,830,000 aggregate principal amount of the Company's Series A Notes was commenced on February 21, 1997. The company announced that the Exchange Offer has been extended and is now scheduled to expire at Midnight, New York City time, on April 14, 1997 unless further extended by the Company. The Company will continue to accept Series A Notes properly tendered pursuant to the exchange offer until the expiration thereof.
